title: Dynamic Fractal Cosmology: A Fibonacci Phase Transition Model
description: This repository contains the LaTeX source and compiled PDF for the research paper 'Dynamic Fractal Cosmology: A Fibonacci Phase Transition Model'. The work introduces a fractal cosmological framework where the golden ratio dynamically evolves, resolving the Hubble tension and explaining CMB anomalies through scale-dependent fractal dimensions. Key predictions include BAO deviations, CMB power deficit at low multipoles, and redshift-dependent growth.
